verbs.description: rockets defense [V: must] adjust quickly as lebron james lakers loom after several days making repairs to their defense after a blowout loss to the pelicans to open the season the rockets will be unable to use many of the corrections against the lakers james ennis iii los angeles lakers rockets band lakers lebron james rockets mike d'antoni james harden
